==Profile==
Excited Paper Frog is a spectator at the jumping contest at [[Rainsong Pond]]. They introduce the [[Traveler]] to the "Bouncing Contest," a challenge that tests the contestant's speed and stability while jumping.

They have a friendly and enthusiastic personality, and are currently training to compete in the next official jumping contest.

===Appearance===
Excited Paper Frog is an origami frog with a green body that fades to yellow at the ends of its limbs. It has orange eyes, an orange belly, and a lotus leaf sitting atop its head.
